mapper.insert: insert into mms_special_role ( roleName, system, creatorId, creatorName, createTime, updateStaffId, updateStaffName, updateTime )select #{roleName}, #{system}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, now(), #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, now() from dual where not exists ( select bu from mms_base_staff_info base where employeeID=#{creatorId} and bu in ( select base.bu from mms_special_role role inner join mms_base_staff_info base on role.creatorId = base.employeeID where role.roleName=#{roleName} ) )
mapper.update: update mms_special_role role inner join ( select 1 from dual where not exists (select * from mms_special_role where roleName=#{roleName} and creatorId=#{creatorId} and roleId <> #{roleId}) ) temp on role.roleId = #{roleId} set role.roleName = #{roleName}, role.system = #{system}, role.updateStaffId = #{updateStaffId}, role.updateStaffName = #{updateStaffName}, role.updateTime =now()

update mms_examination_rule set updateStaffId = #{updateStaffId}, updateStaffName = #{updateStaffName}, updateTime = now(), passScore = #{passScore}, passRule = #{passRule}, excellentScore = #{excellentScore}, excellentRule = #{excellentRule} where ruleId = #{ruleId}
